messages.translation:
Client connection error!
E_PSMS_NOT_CONNECTED
Check if PSMoveService is running, working and accessible by clients.

API connection error!
E_PSMS_NOT_INITIALIZED
Check if PSMoveService is running, working and accessible by clients.

No controllers found!
E_PSMS_NO_JOINTS
Check if any controllers are connected, and if PSMoveService is working properly.
If you're using PSMS for rotation tracking only, you can dim controller LED lights to save power.
